description: Detects the execution of certutil with certain flags that allow the utility to download files from direct IPs.
author: Nasreddine Bencherchali (Nextron Systems)
name: Suspicious File Downloaded From Direct IP Via Certutil.EXE
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\certutil.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"CertUtil.exe")) AND process.command_line.text:("*urlcache\ *" OR "*verifyctl\ *") AND process.command_line.text:("*\:\/\/1*" OR "*\:\/\/2*" OR "*\:\/\/3*" OR "*\:\/\/4*" OR "*\:\/\/5*" OR "*\:\/\/6*" OR "*\:\/\/7*" OR "*\:\/\/8*" OR "*\:\/\/9*")) AND (NOT process.command_line.text:"*\:\/\/7\-*"))
